content.text: Text: Data analytics is the process of examining datasets to draw conclusions about their information. It is increasingly automated and widely used in various industries.
Hyperlink: Learn more on Wikipedia about Data Analytics.
Text: We will explore key topics related to data analytics in the following pages.
